title: Optimal AI Restaurant Menu Scanning Demo
content: The way Optimal AI just scanned my meal and knew EVERYTHING in it... I'm still in shock! showing how Optimal AI helps with restaurant menu scanning
caption: The way Optimal AI just scanned my meal and knew EVERYTHING in it... I'm still in shock! #OptimalAI #CalorieTracking #weight_management

scenes.text: The way Optimal AI just scanned my meal and knew EVERYTHING in it... I'm still in shock!
